articles.author: Tom Coley
articles.title: Romero sends 3-word Tottenham injury message with Man Utd fear after Brentford - Football.London
articles.description: Tottenham injury news: Cristian Romero had to watch on for most of the game after injury against Brentford.
articles.content:
Cristian Romero took to Instagram after Tottenham's opening day 2-2 draw with Brentford having been substituted off in the first half.
The Argentine defending opened the scoring in the game, flickin… [+2969 chars]
